definitions.text: a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
examples: he took the blame for it

definitions.text: the sound made by a gentle blow
genre of African-American music of the 1980s and 1990s in which rhyming lyrics are chanted to a musical accompaniment; several forms of rap have emerged

examples: he gave the table a whack

definitions.text: make light, repeated taps on a surface
examples: he was tapping his fingers on the table impatiently
